summary:
Ancient Ebony Bow + Arrows
Ebony FireBlade
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds two ebony weapons which have been re-textured.. new textures have higher resolutions than original..

Weapons moded:
1) Ebony Greatsword
2) Ebony Bow

the new weapons don\'\'t interfere with the originals..

Can be forged and upgraded (arrows can be forged)..

Can also be found in Qasmoke.. 

May re-do the complete ebony weapon set if i get some more free time..
author: xooki3
